mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.summary, c.name AS category, a.cover_url, a.user_id, a.view, a.favorite, a.modify_time FROM re_article.article a LEFT JOIN re_article.category c ON c.id = a.category_id WHERE a.is_deleted = ${@cn.lingjiatong.re.common.constant.CommonConstant@ENTITY_NORMAL} ORDER BY ${dto.order}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.id) FROM re_article.article a LEFT JOIN re_article.category c ON c.id = a.category_id WHERE a.is_deleted = ${@cn.lingjiatong.re.common.constant.CommonConstant@ENTITY_NORMAL}
